title: MNF Charity Event Hosted by NY Giant Rashad Jennings @ The Royal, NYC
text:
MNF Charity Event Hosted by NY Giant Rashad Jennings @ The Royal, NYC
New York, NY, October 13, 2015 --( PR.com )-- On October 5, 2015, The Rashad Jennings Foundation in partnership with Label 55 and Fashion Stylist Megan Averbuch of Belles & Rebelles hosted a Monday Night Football Charity Event at The Royal in New York City.
The event was hosted by NY Giant Rashad Jennings to benefit The Rashad Jennings Foundation foundation as this star-studded event featured some of today’s present and past NFL players as well as other professional athletes and celebrities mingling with fashionistas, entertainers, and other industry professionals in this intimate, exclusive event. The event was highly successful as it generated over $5,000 to benefit The Rashad Jennings Foundation.
Some of the event’s notable attendees included: NY Giant Rashad Jennings, NY Giant Rueben Randle, NY Giant Andre Williams, NY Giant Jon Casillas, NY Giant Jonathan Hankins, NY Jet Jeff Cumberland, NY Knick Cleanthony Early, Former NY Jet Donald Strickland, Former NY Jet & Chicago Bear Steve Maneri, Former NY Jet Bobby Jackson, Former NY Jet Erik Coleman, Former Detroit Piston Mark Hughes, Recording Artist Driicky Graham, Recording Artist Xavier White, Hot 97’s DJ Relly Rell, Tracy G from Sway In The Morning and Actor Gbenga Akinnagbe.
A special thanks to the event attendees, donors and sponsors, including: Wantickets.com, Rocksmith Clothing, BarnBurner, Schuyler 4 Showroom, Alberto Pants, Codice, Carl Gross, Haupt, Sisley, YEROC By Corey Woods, OneGround Footwear, Little Miracles Beverages, Menaji, Lulu DK and TFHitting Room.
Enjoy the official recap video https://youtu.be/-Ks3x4ZcGUA
